item.title: Rahmat add a quote by Bruce Lee
item.description: "Use only that which works, and take it from any place you can find it." -- Bruce Lee

item.title: Rahmat add a quote by Jiddu Krishnamurti
item.description: "It is truth that liberates, not your effort to be free." -- Jiddu Krishnamurti

item.title: Rahmat add a quote by Bruce Lee
item.description: "Adapt what is useful, reject what is useless, and add what is specifically your own." -- Bruce Lee

item.title: Rahmat add a quote by Bruce Lee
item.description: "The doubters said, "Man can not fly," The doers said, "Maybe, but we'll try," And finally soared In the morning glow While non-believers Watched from below." -- Bruce Lee

item.title: Rahmat add a quote by Bruce Lee
item.description: "Do not pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one" -- Bruce Lee

item.title: Rahmat add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures. Simple in actions and thoughts, you return to the source of being. Patient with both friends and enemies, you accord with the way things are. Compassionate toward yourself, you reconcile all beings in the world." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Rahmat add a quote by Miyamoto Musashi
item.description: "The primary thing when you take a sword in your hands is your intention to cut the enemy, whatever the means. Whenever you parry, hit, spring, strike or touch the enemy's cutting sword, you must cut the enemy in the same movement. It is essential to attain this. If you think only of hitting, springing, striking or touching the enemy, you will not be able actually to cut him." -- Miyamoto Musashi

item.title: Rahmat add a quote by Miyamoto Musashi
item.description: "You should not have any special fondness for a particular weapon, or anything else, for that matter. Too much is the same as not enough. Without imitating anyone else, you should have as much weaponry as suits you." -- Miyamoto Musashi

item.title: Rahmat add a quote by Johann wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "knowing is not enough,we must apply willing is not enough,we must do.." -- Johann wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Rahmat add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "First they ignore you, then they ridicule you, then they fight you, and then you win." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Rahmat add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description: "Bermimpilah, karena Tuhan akan memeluk mimpi-mimpi itu." -- Andrea Hirata
